study_title: Finucane HK, Bulik-Sullivan, Partitioning heritability by functional annotation using genome-wide association summary statistics.
free_text: Set of annotations used for LDSCORE partitioning heritability. Info for each annotation are available in the original publication

nodes.description: Annotations from RefSeq gene models were obtained from the UCSC Genome Browser and post-processed by Gusev et al.
Regions conserved in mammals were obtained from Lindblad-Toh et al  and post-processed by Ward and Kelli.
The combined chromHMM and Segway annotations for six cell lines were obtained from Hoffman et al. This annotation is the union over the six cell lines.
DNaseI Digital Genomic Footprinting from ENCODE3 and post-processed by Gusev et al.
DHSs are a combination of ENCODE and Roadmap Epigenomics data, post-processed by Trynka et al. Union of cell type–specific annotations.
DHSs are a combination of ENCODE and Roadmap Epigenomics data, post-processed by Trynka et al. Union of cell type–specific annotations.
The combined chromHMM and Segway annotations for six cell lines were obtained from Hoffman et al. This annotation is the union over the six cell lines.
FANTOM5 enhancers were obtained from Andersson et al.
DHSs are a combination of ENCODE and Roadmap Epigenomics data, post-processed by Trynka et al. Union of cell type–specific annotations.
Cell type–specific H3K4me1, H3K4me3 and H3K9ac data were all obtained from Roadmap Epigenomics and post-processed by Trynka et al. For each mark, we took a union over cell types
